SMAR.BR.summary: Smartphoto Group NV operates in the B2C e-commerce business in Europe. The company offers personalized products, including photo books, personalized gifts, cards, calendars, wall decoration products, and prints under the smartphoto name. It also provides personalized products under the Spector name to independent photographers. The company was formerly known as Spector Photo Group NV and changed its name to Smartphoto Group NV in May 2013. Smartphoto Group NV was founded in 1964 and is based in Wetteren, Belgium.
